name: Enoshiman
text:
Hello, Shiratori-kun.
You're able to walk already!

The person who saved me from the monsters
after I lost everything and drifted to Enoshima,
with no meaning or hope left in my empty self—

When I reunited with Enoshiman,
I instinctively bowed deeply.

name: Shiratori
text:
Enoshiman-san.
Thank you very much for saving
me from the monsters.

name: Shiratori
text:
And, I'm sorry.
I couldn't properly thank you
the other day...

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah-hah!
You don't need to worry about such things.
Just seeing you well is enough for me.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Also, you don't need to use "-san".
Just call me "Enoshiman",
like everyone else in Enoshima!

name: Shiratori
text:
Understood.
Uh, Enoshiman...

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah, that's the spirit!
...By the way, Shiratori-kun.
Have you gotten used to life in Enoshima?

name: Shiratori
text:
Yes, thanks to you...
It's a peaceful and wonderful place here.
The islanders have been kind to me too.

name: Shiratori
text:
I've also found a place to live.
Saotome-san from the village
office helped me find it.

name: Shiratori
text:
He said, "There are plenty of vacant properties
to choose from!" and showed me many places.
I got a little tired from all the walking, though.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Hah-hah-hah!
That's just like Saotome-kun!
I can picture it perfectly.

name: Enoshiman
text:
It's good that you found a house, of course,
but it's also good that your expression
has regained some of its cheerfulness!

I had suddenly lost everything,
with no meaning or hope in life.
I, who was empty, was saved—

Not only that, even now, in front of this hero
who cares about me, I tried to act
as cheerful as possible.

Because I thought Enoshiman would surely
be happier that way.

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Oh, it's time.
I should return to my patrol soon.
See you again, Shiratori-kun.

name: Enoshiman
text:
If a monster appears, don't hesitate to call me!
I'll protect you no matter how many times it takes!
Hah-hah-hah!!

Declaring that with a hearty laugh,
Enoshiman ran off with great momentum.

Enoshiman,
the one and only local hero
who protects Enoshima.

I wanted to help him even a little...
I wanted to support this island he loved.
So I became a village office staff member.

I truly wanted to fight alongside him,
but I didn't have that kind of power.

name: Saotome
text:
Starting today, Shiratori-kun
will be working with us at the village
office as a part-timer!

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone, please welcome him
with your warm applause!

name: Office Staff
text:
Of course we'd welcome you, Shiratori!
We're always short-staffed here!

name: Saotome
text:
Hey, hey!?
Don't surprise him on his first day, alright!?

name: Saotome
text:
It's true there's a lot to do,
but you're still recovering.
Don't overdo it, and rely on us!

name: Shiratori
text:
Thank you, Saotome-san.
...I'm Shiratori, as introduced.

name: Shiratori
text:
To not waste the life
Enoshiman saved...

name: Shiratori
text:
And to repay the kindness of Enoshima
for accepting me, who lost my hometown,
I will do my best, even if my life's on the line.

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
Your enthusiasm is admirable, but
you don't need to be so stressed!

As Saotome-san and the others said,
there was indeed a lot of work at the village office.
Patrolling the island, guiding children to safety—

Even if each one was a small task,
if it meant helping Enoshiman,
I felt a sense of purpose.

At that time, I couldn't possibly think
of doing anything for myself, but...

I believed that if it meant helping that local hero,
I could do anything. I believed that I survived
for that very purpose.

name: Shiratori
text:
Well then,
I'm off to patrol again today.

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh, thank you.
Be careful on your way!

name: Saotome
text:
When you get back,
how about some whitebait soft serve?
It's my treat, of course!

Life in the new environment was tough,
but I was spending fulfilling days,
doing what I wanted to do.

...However.
As expected, perhaps.
The happy days didn't last long.

name: Monster
text: Gyaooooooh!

name: Shiratori
text: Ugh...!

One day, as usual,
the village office staff split up
to patrol Enoshima.

I was attacked by a giant monster
at the edge of the village.

I tried to escape instinctively, but
the impact of hitting my entire body left me breathless,
and I couldn't even stand up.

name: Shiratori
text:
I see...
Am I going to die here after all...?

Approaching me, was the monster's inorganic maw.
The abominable entity that swallowed everything in my hometown.

I wanted to see Enoshiman
just one last time.

Before I left this world,
I wanted to thank him one more time.

name: Shiratori
text:
If I'm going to die anyway...
At least...

name: Enoshiman
text:
—You aren't dying today!
I promised to protect you, didn't I?

Even though I didn't call for help,
Enoshiman suddenly appeared
and punched the giant monster.

name: Shiratori
text:
—Enoshiman!
Y-You came... but,
hurry... please escape too!

name: Shiratori
text:
I've never seen such a giant monster before!
I don't think even you can defeat it...

name: Enoshiman
text:
...Shiratori-kun, I appreciate your concern,
but what would happen to Enoshima
if I were to run away here?

name: Enoshiman
text:
I can't let the people of Enoshima
be attacked by monsters!
That, of course, includes you!

Enoshiman, without flinching
from the giant monster,
fought bravely.

name: Shiratori
text:
Enoshiman...
For someone like me...
Why would you go this far...!?

name: Enoshiman
text:
Of course I would!
Shiratori-kun, you have always helped me by even
becoming a village office staff member yourself.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Thanks to you taking the
initiative to patrol the island,
I was able to save the children.

name: Enoshiman
text:
If I can't risk my life for you,
how can I call myself a local hero?

Enoshiman, upon his declaration,
launched a fierce attack on the giant monster
while protecting me from behind.

However,
fighting while protecting a "nuisance"
hindered Enoshiman's movements—

And he was pushed back by the
overwhelming power of the monster,
unable to unleash his full strength.

name: Enoshiman
text:
More than my own...
I need you to be safe...

Enoshiman was caught off guard for a moment,
and was then swallowed by the monster.

name: Shiratori
text:
No way...!
Enoshiman...!?

name: Shiratori
text:
Don't mess with me!
Enoshiman...!
Give me back Enoshiman!!

Rage killed the pain inside me.
I moved my disobedient legs haphazardly,
and desperately lunged at the monster—

My hands vainly cut
through the air.

Perhaps satisfied after swallowing the hero,
or due to the damage it had sustained—

The monster suddenly disappeared from sight,
just like the way it had appeared.

name: Shiratori
text:
Damn it...!
I've lost another important person to me...!

name: Shiratori
text:
I can't even save the person right in
front of me, and my miserable self got away alone...!
And again...

That's when I realized.
That it was all my fault.

name: Shiratori
text:
It's all my fault.
If I hadn't come to Enoshima...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Enoshiman wouldn't have died
protecting someone useless like me.

name: Shiratori
text:
If Enoshiman were alive,
I wouldn't care what happened to me...!

I couldn't forgive anything.
Neither the monster that swallowed Enoshiman,
nor myself who caused it to happen.

name: Shiratori
text:
That's right...
It's wrong for a useless person like
me to survive and for Enoshiman to die.

name: Shiratori
text:
I can never forgive that.
Therefore, I will correct that mistake.
I will revive Enoshiman...!

Ironically,
I gained the ability to fight as a hero
after losing Enoshiman.

The suit I wear is, of course,
the same as Enoshiman's.
I, Shiratori, am no longer needed there.

—From that day on, I
"became Enoshiman".

Chapter 7:
Enoshima's Last Resort

At the deserted Enoshima Station,
the group witnessed EnoRail speeding away.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
It hasn't gone that far yet!
At this distance, we might be able to catch up
with our Parallel Weapons...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
—No, we "have" to catch up!
Let's go, [Player]-san!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]!
Let's show them
our stubbornness.

options.text: It's too early to give up, right?

name: Saotome
text:
...[Player]-kun.
Please take me with you.
I beg you, please!

Saotome clasped his hands together and pleaded
with [Player] and the others, who had made up their minds.

name: Saotome
text:
Even if we catch up to EnoRail,
we'll then have to stop EnoRail itself!

name: Saotome
text:
I can stop EnoRail.
How to use the emergency brake,
it's even written in the manual for emergencies!

name: Saotome
text:
Most of all, I don't want to burden
everyone any further.
Please, let me accompany you!

As the group, who had nodded to each other,
was about to leave Enoshima Station,
numerous monsters appeared inside the station.

name: Monster
text: —Giiiiiih!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Whoa!?
Monsters at a time like this!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
We can't ignore them, of course.
However, we must pursue EnoRail
immediately...

name: Saotome
text:
Oh no...!
Time is of the essence, and yet...!

options.text: Do we have no choice but to split up...?

name: Kiloc
text:
—Go!
You have to stop that train, right!?

name: Joezen
text:
We'll take care of things here!
[Player] and the others,
please chase the train!!

The parent and child heroes of Estevolta,
wielding their Parallel Weapons,
scattered the monsters.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Kiloc-san!
And you too, Joezen-kun!

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh!?
As expected of Estevolta's local heroes!
You came at the perfect time!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Thank you.
But what are you doing here?

name: Kiloc
text:
Alend asked us to!
He said our help
would surely be needed!

name: Joezen
text:
This is a critical situation, isn't it!?
Hurry, before it's too late!!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
We can't waste the time
Kiloc and Joezen bought us.
—Let's hurry too.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san,
please ride behind me!
I'll definitely take you to EnoRail!

name: Saotome
text:
Understood!
I might be quite heavy, but
I'm counting on you, Yohack-kun!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player].
Please ride my board.
Let's go stop EnoRail together.

name: Monster
text: —Guooooooh!

Countless monsters attacked the group
who had boarded their Parallel Weapons.
However—

name: Kiloc
text:
"Advance"!
Stin Irémi Thálatta!
You can't just have your way so easily!

The barrier deployed from the
anchor thrown by Kiloc
blocked the monsters' advance.

name: Joezen
text:
...Now's our chance!
While the Captain is holding back
the monsters, I'll send you all off!

name: Saotome
text:
Send us off...?
What do you mean by that,
Joezen-kun...?

name: Joezen
text:
—This is what I meant!
Be careful not to bite your tongue!

name: Joezen
text:
"Advance"!
Diadromí se Aithría!
Brace yourselves for tailwinds and high waves!

Joezen gripped his pen-shaped Parallel Weapon,
and wrote something on the nautical chart.

name: Saotome
text:
Whoa!?
Wh-What a tremendous gust of wind!?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san, you'd already know this,
but Joezen-kun's Parallel Weapon
can interfere with the weather!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
I see.
High waves heading offshore, huh.
Perfect for chasing the train.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player], match my breathing.
I shall ride this wave.

The tailwind created by Joezen,
and the accompanying high waves
pushed the group forward.

With that momentum,
the jet ski and surfboard
slid across the water at incredible speed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's alright, [Player].
I have no intention of putting you in danger.
Please trust me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's alright, [Player].
I have no intention of putting you in danger.
Please trust me.

options.text: It feels good cutting through the wind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't let your guard down, [Player].
However, to not flinch even at this speed, that might be just like you...

name: Saotome
text:
If it weren't for this situation, I'd be able to feel
the sea and wind of Enoshima to the fullest, and
laugh, saying how refreshing it is...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Let's bring back the fun Enoshima
with our own hands, Saotome-san.
Now, let's catch up to the train—!!

The group, advancing across the
water like they were sliding on it,
was rapidly approaching EnoRail.

And gradually,
they could see someone
standing on the roof.

name: Man in the Shadows?
text:
—I see.
You've come after all.

Even though his appearance was different,
the group knew that person.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Shiratori...
So you were alive after all.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I'm incredibly happy
that you are alive, Shiratori-san, but...

[Player] and the others were speechless
at Shiratori's completely different appearance.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun...?
You're alive...!

name: Saotome
text:
But why are you moving EnoRail?
And what happened to that appearance of yours?
"Like a hero"—

name: Saotome
text:
As [Player]-kun said,
are you Enoshiman after all?

name: Saotome
text:
But if so, why are
you in a different suit...?

name: Enoshiman?
text:
To pretend to be Enoshiman,
and try to correct the mistake
of losing that person—

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Someone the likes of me
could never do it.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
And at that time, watching the
heroes get hurt with my own eyes...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I finally realized my wish.
What I truly wanted to protect was...!

At that moment, Shiratori paused,
and looked down at his weapon.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
If our suits and our Parallel Weapons
are the embodiment of our wishes...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Don't you think it's only natural
for a hero suit to change into a form
befitting one's true wish?

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Most of all...
Someone like me can't possibly be Enoshiman.
The real Enoshiman is much more...!

The shouting Shiratori quietly spoke to them,
holding a whirring chainsaw that spun around in his hands.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
—Don't come any closer.
I don't want to fight you all.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
That's why, I started EnoRail
from Enoshima Station, and yet...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
You'd acquire your new forms
and still chase after me...!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Shiratori.
I don't know what your objective is,
but stop the train immediately.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
You should know it yourself.
This train supports Enoshima's very livelihood.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
The safety of the tracks
hasn't been confirmed yet.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
If it keeps running like this,
it might derail and sink.
If that happens, Enoshima too—

name: Enoshiman?
text:
That would be convenient.
After all, I'm running this train
to destroy Enoshima itself.

options.text: What do you mean by that!?

name: Enoshiman?
text: ...This is what I mean!

Without answering [Player]'s question,
Shiratori instead swung his chainsaw.

The constantly rotating blade sliced through the sea,
and high waves assaulted [Player] and the others.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Whoa!
These waves...!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]!
Grab onto me!

Shiratori, from atop EnoRail,
declared to the group, who lost their balance
from the sudden attack.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I will sink this train into the sea,
and free the heroes from Enoshima!
I would appreciate it if you didn't interfere.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
This is my final warning.
If you still choose to pursue me, I will show
no mercy, even if you are my opponents.

EnoRail pulled away again,
leaving the group, who were tossed
by the high waves, behind.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun, the one who protected Enoshima
as Enoshiman, is now destroying Enoshima...?

name: Saotome
text:
What on earth
is happening...?

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun is not the kind of person
to do something like this...
And that appearance...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...To ask Shiratori-san that, and to stop him,
we have no choice but to chase after him now!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Yohack is right.
Whatever Shiratori is planning,
we cannot let him destroy EnoRail.

The group nodded to each other,
and once again rode their Parallel Weapons.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
You're still pursuing me, are you?
You truly are—

name: Enoshiman?
text:
It can't be helped.
It will be too rough a method,
but I will shake you off!

Shiratori sliced the sea with his chainsaw,
creating violently swirling large waves.

name: Saotome
text:
Whoa!?
Now it's a head-on wave!?

Even before the wall-like high waves assaulting the group,
Yohack and Astar never flinched.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san!
I'm going to speed up a bit, so
hold on tight!

name: Saotome
text:
Whoaah!?
This speed is incredible!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player], let's synchronize!
We'll cut through the waves and reach
the other side!

Astar and Yohack skillfully manipulated their Parallel Weapons,
breaking through the raging waves and closing in on EnoRail.

options.text: To not be bothered by high waves...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
As expected of true heroes.
This much won't even slow you down, huh.
—However!

Shiratori plunged his chainsaw into the sea.
The spinning blade churned the water,
creating a violently swirling whirlpool.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Ugh...!
At this rate, my speed will...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
It's alright,
Astar-san, [Player]-san!
I'll guide everyone!

Yohack pulled a rope from his jet ski,
and threw it to Astar.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Full throttle!
Everyone, brace for impact!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
"Unlock"!
Omnes Exitus!

Yohack pulled Astar while
breaking through the swirling white waves
at incredible speed.

However, beyond that,
a giant mass of water unleashed by Shiratori
was waiting to swallow the group.

name: Saotome
text:
Whoaah!?
What is it this time!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]!
I'll open a breakthrough!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Yohack!
No matter the means!
Throw me forward!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
U-Understood!
Astar-san!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
—How about
this!

Yohack spun the jet ski,
and launched Astar forward with centrifugal force.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Waves of this degree
will not stop our advance!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
"Blessing"!
Sommer Lächeln!

Astar, soaring through the air,
sliced the giant mass of water in half
with his paddle-shaped Parallel Weapon.

And the group, with the
momentum slicing through the wave,
leaped onto EnoRail.

Onto the sea train that roared with acceleration,
cutting through the wind and surging across the vast ocean.

And, on the roof where
strong winds howled,
—Shiratori stood.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
—To break though so easily.
So this is what a true hero is...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Even so, I
cannot give up.

name: Saotome
text:
...Shiratori-kun.
Can't you stop the train no matter what?
Do we really have to fight?

name: Saotome
text:
You, who once protected Enoshima as a local hero,
why are you trying to destroy Enoshima now...!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome.
He's already made up his mind.
Further questioning is meaningless...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...Astar-san.
I want to hear the reason.
From Shiratori-san's own words.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
It might have been a short time,
but we worked hard together
for village revitalization, didn't we?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
And yet,
if we can't avoid fighting,
at least, tell us the reason...!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
—A world where kind people fight monsters,
and are the first to get hurt.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Don't you think that
such a world is wrong?

name: Enoshiman?
text:
...To protect ordinary citizens, some people
are the first to jump into danger.
That's what heroes are.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Such kind people, always sacrificing
themselves to stand on the front lines,
and then get hurt and fall.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I cannot believe in the
righteousness of such a world.

name: Saotome
text: Shiratori-kun...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
[Player]-san.
Isn't it precisely because you think so
that you're here on the battlefield?

name: Enoshiman?
text:
To fight alongside heroes,
and to take on even a little of
the heroes' suffering.

options.text: I understand how you feel, Shiratori-san, but...

text:
Receiving [Player]'s words,
Shiratori opened his mouth again.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Think about it.
This isolated island, so close to South Kanto,
is by no means a safe place.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Because there are people clinging to such a place,
heroes get hurt protecting them.
I have witnessed that firsthand.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Yohack-kun!
Astar-kun!
Are you two alright!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Of course.
I'm not one to give up with this much.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I can still do it!
Until we properly protect
the people of Enoshima!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Just as I thought.
You "heroes" would so easily...
if it's to protect someone!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I realized.
The wish I truly wanted to fulfill was not
to inherit Enoshiman's will—

name: Enoshiman?
text:
But to protect kind people like Enoshiman...
To protect you heroes.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
That's why I decided to
free the heroes from Enoshima.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
If I sink EnoRail, which supports Enoshima,
to the bottom of the sea,
life on this island will become unsustainable.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
If I continue to accelerate like this,
EnoRail will derail before long.
And then, everything will end.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Wait!
Shiratori-san, if you do that,
you will also plunge into the sea...!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
.........
...No.
I should have done this sooner.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
If so,
I wouldn't have invited you
all to Enoshima, and hurt you.

Upon his declaration, Shiratori
whispered towards his device.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
—Anonymous.
Lend me your strength.

Shiratori, having received ViewPower from a remote operator,
concentrated his power into his chainsaw.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Please forgive me.
I must free the heroes,
even if it means fighting you all!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Otherwise,
a second Enoshiman will appear someday,
and eventually fall prey to monsters!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I will not let such a
mistake be repeated once again!

Shiratori shouted that,
and swung his chainsaw with all his might.

Astar blocked the attacking
chainsaw with his paddle.

However, the aftermath of the attack
inflicted definite damage on the heroes.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Ugh...!
What power...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
At this rate,
we'll be thrown off...!

Shiratori's chainsaw
gradually cornered the heroes.

Saotome, seeing the backs of the heroes
fighting to protect him,
trembled his fist.

name: Saotome
text:
Am I again
unable to do anything?

name: Saotome
text:
Just like that time,
can I only be protected
by the heroes?

name: Saotome
text:
—No!
I didn't come here to be protected.
This time, I must protect everyone!

name: Saotome
text:
Please, [Player]-kun...
I want to help everyone...

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun,
Astar-kun, Yohack-kun...!
And—

name: Saotome
text:
Enoshiman—
I want to save Shiratori-kun!

The moment Saotome shouted,
the device held by [Player]
emitted a blinding light.

name: Mobile Device
text:
New path detected.
Target: Saotome
Strength: Very Strong

options.text: It seems I can help your wish, Saotome-san.
I will observe your dream, Saotome-san.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
This is the end!
Oooooooh!!

The next moment, a tremendous blow
assaulted [Player] and the others—

name: Saotome
text:
If I can lure them outside the village,
it'll be a bit easier to fight!

name: Saotome
text:
I can't just stand by
and watch you all get hurt
anymore!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Connect to path?
To start operation,
tap "OK".

name: Saotome
text:
I won't let you!
This time, I will protect everyone!

Saotome's giant shield
blocked Shiratori's chainsaw.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
No way...!
You...!?

name: Saotome
text:
I'm done relying on others!
From now on, I will protect the heroes...
and Enoshima with my own hands!

name: Saotome
text:
"Reconstruct"!
Yesterday Once More!

The flag Saotome raised fluttered in the wind,
emitting a warm light that enveloped the heroes.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Th-This light is...!
A warm power...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san...!
[Player]-san...
Your wish...!

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone...
Thank you very much for protecting
this unreliable me until now...!

name: Saotome
text:
But I'm no longer just someone who's protected!
From now on, I'll fight alongside you!

The warm glow emanating from Saotome's flag
gradually converged—

When the light subsided, there stood
Saotome, clad in a suit that tightly enveloped
his entire body just like Enoshiman.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Saotome-san.
Is that the form of your dream...!?

name: Saotome
text:
That's right.
It's the form of my dream, who has always
watched Enoshiman protect Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
With this flag and shield,
I will protect everyone, and Enoshima.
...Including you, Shiratori-kun.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
...You too are saying the
same thing as Enoshiman.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
You aren't a fake like I am,
but you are wearing a true hero suit.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
...But, even so, I will
persue the path that I believe in!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san.
This time, let's stop Shiratori-san.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
We can definitely do it.
Stopping vehicles is our specialty.

name: Saotome
text:
Yohack-kun, Astar-kun.
And [Player]-kun.

name: Saotome
text:
I want to stop Shiratori-kun.
So, please fight with me!

options.text: If we're all together, we can surely do it!

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you...!
I will definitely protect everyone!
Battle Start

note:
The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!

name: Saotome
text:
After passing through this tunnel,
there's a gentle curve!

name: Saotome
text:
At this speed, let alone the usual speed,
we can't make the turn!
Shiratori-kun's aim is probably there!

name: Saotome
text:
We have to defeat Shiratori-kun
and stop EnoRail before then!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Understood, Saotome-san!
Let's fight together!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
To protect Enoshima,
and to save Shiratori-san...!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Of course. Since we've been entrusted with
Enoshiman by the children of Enoshima,
we cannot break that promise.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player].
I'm counting on your operation.
[Trigger condition: End of Turn 1]

name: Enoshiman?
text:
You're still formidable, aren't you?
So this is the power of a true hero...!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
And, [Player]-san's power to
refuse leaving a hero by themselves...!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
—However, even so,
I cannot lose this battle!
[Trigger condition: End of Turn 2]

name: Saotome
text:
Ugh...!
We've entered the underwater tunnel.
There's, no time left...!

note:
The following dialogue will be shown depending on the start of a character's turn.
This can be altered by any Speed buffs/debuffs, but none of them have
that in their kit, so the intended reading sequence is from left to right.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shiratori-san...
You're still fighting in a darkness without an exit, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's why I will rescue you from there.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Even if you do not wish for it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman?
dialogue_after_selection.text: You're going out of your way to save me, even though I hurt you...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: You've always, all by yourself, protected Enoshima!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: Isn't it because you had even the littlest bit of love for Enoshima!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman?
dialogue_after_selection.text: Enoshiman, the Enoshima he always protected...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, Saotome-san.
What I truly want to protect is...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Shiratori.
I thought your acting policy (as Enoshiman) wasn't bad.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hiding your true face behind a mask, as someone who brings smiles to children.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's precisely why I will stop you, and bring back the children's smiles.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman?
dialogue_after_selection.text: For that, you're willing to suffer, Astar-san?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Enoshiman?
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That can't be true.
There's no reason why only heroes should have to bear suffering...!

text: [Trigger condition: Start of Shiratori's turn]

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I think I understand
your strength, your kindness,
and what you want to say...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Even so...
I have chosen my own path...!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
The path to save
heroes from suffering!!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
It's not just suffering.
While fighting for someone else, we also
receive joy and happiness...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
There are tough times, but
even so, we chose it ourselves...
We're heroes because we love it!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
It's not just heroes
who live with wounds.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Everyone, too, lives doing their best
with what they can.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
That's why I want to be someone who can deliver
the warmth I received this time.
...That's all.

name: Saotome
text:
I understand it too.
Shiratori-kun, your very own kindness.

name: Saotome
text:
But, Shiratori-kun, to me, you
still seem to be suffering.

name: Saotome
text:
That's why this time,
I will protect you, Shiratori-kun.
Just as you protected me until now...!
[Trigger condition: Shiratori reaches 50% HP]

name: Enoshiman?
text:
As expected, you all are true heroes...!
That's why I cannot yield!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I will win this battle,
destroy the abominable chains that bind you,
and free the heroes from Enoshima!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Ugh...!
Shiratori-san has
an incredible fighting spirit...!

name: Saotome
text:
There's no time left!
To protect Enoshima,
we must stop Shiratori-kun quickly!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Of course.
I also want to stop him.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Voice person.
Lend us your power!
[Trigger condition: Shiratori reaches 0% HP]

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Ugh...!
I... still...

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Until I... free the heroes...
I cannot... fall...!
